__e: How could you do something like that?
How could you do something like that?
Mother, how could you do this and not tell me?
How could you do this without telling me?
I mean, not that you could have, but, I'm just saying.
You couldn't have just told me that it was the night that we-- you know.
How could you have had it then if it's here?
You couldn't see it, but I could, so now they're all gone.
I thought so, too, I was sure of it, but you didn't!
You couldn't do it then, and you don't want to do it now. God's giving you a second chance right here.
You couldn't see it, but I could, so now they're all gone.
You couldn't do it then, and you don't want to do it now. God's giving you a second chance right here.
I thought so, too, I was sure of it, but you didn't!
You couldn't even remember that we haven't seen each other for 17 years?
You didn't even remember my name!
You couldn't even apologize to her.
You didn't even remember my name!
Hm-hmm. Had a letter from him yesterday. I'm keeping him in touch on your condition.
You could... Take care of yourself now, and...
But you couldn't even get your own girlfriend.
Yeah, but you couldn't keep your mouth shut for two more minutes, could you?
- You couldn't even do that right.
She already sent me a note about it! And I've already paid her a visit today.
But you couldn't talk to me, tell me what you needed.
You couldn't stop the accident because it was never your fault.
Ain't your fault, the way I heard it, but you lost.
There was nothing you could do for her.
You couldn't just let me be.
You did not see me, I was out all day.
You couldn't kill me, I couldn't kill you. I'll take that as a sign.
You couldn't kill me, I couldn't kill you. I'll take that as a sign.
You did not see me, I was out all day.
